text.calc: The creator and producer strings are shown by some PDF readers in their document properties/information window.You may substitute the 'Omnis Studio' portion of the creator string and the 'Brainy Data' portion of the producer string with names more apropriate for your software, i.e./Creator (00000001#My Product Name00000000#)/Producer (00000002#00000003#00000001#My Company Name00000002#00000000#, PDFDevice v2.1.5 for MacOSX)This change is not stored in between sessions so it must be set every time Omnis starts.
